entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 50
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING

MOSTLY CLOUDY AND BREEZY

MOSTLY SUNNY
